description: Enjoy an easy stroll along the pleasant boardwalk path along the River Liffey on this short walk in the city centre of Dublin. On the way you will pass a number of historic bridges and interesting old buildings. Start off at the Grattan Bridge next to Ormond Quay on the northern side of the river. From here you can pick up the boardwalk and follow it east towards the Millennium Bridge, Ha'penny Bridge, Bachelor's Walk, O'Connell Bridge before finishing at Butt Bridge. To continue your waterside walking in the city you could pick up the Dublin Canal Walk along the Grand Canal Way .
